titleInfo.title: Performance - R & B For You And Me - 2004-03-27

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Performance and interviews with the Nick Nixon band from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March, 27, 2004. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
